titleStmt.title: The mourners memorial in two sermons on the death of the truly pious Mris. Susanna Soame, late wife of Bartholomew Soame of Thurlow, Esq., who deceased Febru. 14, 1691/2 : with some account of her death / by Timothy Wright, Robert Fleming.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Timothy.
Fleming, Robert, 1660?-1716.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Salusbury and John Harris,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
